TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OracleDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OracleDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供从数据源读取数据行的只进流的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 对象。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多个可以在任何给定时间中打开。More than one can be open at any given time. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`连接时， `DataReader`，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a connection, a `DataReader`, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前行的嵌套深度。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the depth of nesting for the current row.
The depth of nesting for the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最外面的表的深度为零。The outermost table has a depth of zero.

summary.span: 获取当前行中的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 如果不是位于有效的记录集中，则为 0；否则为当前记录的列数。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括隐藏的字段。Includes hidden fields. 使用 可排除隐藏的字段。Use to exclude hidden fields. 执行不返回行，一个查询后返回 0。After executing a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

span.span: There is no current connection to a data source.

Public Overrides Function GetBytes (i As Integer, fieldOffset As Long, buffer2 As Byte(), bufferoffset As Integer, length As Integer) As Long
public: override long GetBytes(int i, long fieldOffset, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ buffer2, int bufferoffset, int length);
override this.GetBytes : int * int64 * byte[] * int * int -> int64

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: fieldOffset
param.span: 字段中读取操作开始位置的索引。

span.span: The index within the field where the read operation is to begin.

param.name: buffer2
param.span: 要读入字节流的缓冲区。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferoffset
param.span: 开始写操作位置的索引。

span.span: The index where is to begin the write operation.
The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 将字节流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the given buffer offset.

returns.span: 读取的实际字节数。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字节数。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 在大多数情况下，这是该字段的确切长度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度如果`GetBytes`具有用于从字段中获取字节。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 这可能情况下，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置的。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果传递的缓冲区，则 null 值，返回的字段长度以字节为单位。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in bytes.

summary.span: 将字符流从指定列偏移量读入到缓冲区中，将其作为从给定缓冲区偏移量开始的数组。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回字段中的可用字符数。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 在大多数情况下，这是该字段的确切长度。In most cases this is the exact length of the field. 但是，返回的数字可能小于字段的真实长度如果`GetChars`具有用于从字段获取字符。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetChars` has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 这可能情况下，例如，如果正在读取到缓冲区中的大型数据结构。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅`SequentialAccess`设置的。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting of . 如果传递的缓冲区，则 null 值。If you pass a buffer that is a null value. 以字符为单位返回字段的长度。 returns the length of the field in characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然可以使用此方法以检索显式枚举器，在支持 foreach 的语言构造，以直接使用循环构造循环访问数据读取器中的行将会更简单。Although you can use this method to retrieve an explicit enumerator, in languages that support a foreach construct, it's simpler to use the looping construct directly in order to iterate through the rows in the data reader.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetOracleValues(object[] values) cil managed
Public Function GetOracleValues (values As Object()) As Integer

param.name: values
param.span: 将特性列复制到的 类型的数组。

span.span: An array of type into which to copy the attribute columns.

summary.span: 获取以 Oracle 格式表示的当前行中所有的特性列。

span.span: Gets all the attribute columns in the current row in Oracle format.

returns.span: 数组中的 实例数。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，方法提供了高效检索所有列，而不是逐个都检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually. 可以将传递数组，其中包含少于得到的行中包含的列数。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 数据量数组保存复制到数组。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 你还可以传递其长度是多个结果行中包含的列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns.

summary.span: 获取表示基础提供程序特定值的对象的数组。

span.span: Gets an array of objects that are a representation of the underlying provider specific values.

returns.span: 数组中的 实例数。

span.span: The number of instances of in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于大多数应用程序，方法提供了高效检索所有列，而不是逐个都检索每个列。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, rather than retrieving each column individually. 可以将传递数组，其中包含少于得到的行中包含的列数。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 数据量数组保存复制到数组。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 你还可以传递其长度是多个结果行中包含的列数的数组。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns contained in the resulting row. 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchemaTable() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable

summary.span: 返回一个 ，它描述 OracleDataReader 的列元数据。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the OracleDataReader.

returns.span: 一个描述列元数据的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法按以下顺序返回有关每个列的元数据：The method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 列DataReader Column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |列名ColumnName|列; 的名称这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果无法确定列名称，则返回 null 值。If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此名称始终反映当前视图或命令文本中的列的最新的命名。This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|从零开始的列序号。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此列不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|列中值的最大可取长度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 对于使用固定长度的数据类型的列，这是数据类型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果是数值数据类型，这是列的最大精度。If is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精度取决于列的定义。The precision depends on the definition of the column. `Float` 和`Double`在 Oracle 中的数据类型为二进制精度。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary precision.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果是数值数据类型，小数点右侧的位数。If is a numeric data type, the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. `Float` 和`Double`Oracle 中的数据类型是二进制的规模。`Float` and `Double` data types in Oracle are binary scale.| |数据类型DataType|映射到公共语言运行时类型的。Maps to the common language runtime type of .| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果列包含二进制长对象 (BLOB)，包含非常长的数据。`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果使用者可以将列设置为 null 的值;否则为`false`。`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value; otherwise, `false`. 列可能包含 null 值，即使它不能设置为 null 值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |是唯一的IsUnique|`true`：任何两个行中返回表的基表中-可以在此列中具有相同的值。`true`: No two rows in the base table-the table returned in -can have the same value in this column. **IsUnique**保证可`true`如果列本身组成了一个键或仅适用于此列的 UNIQUE 类型的约束。**IsUnique** is guaranteed to be `true` if the column constitutes a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column. `false`：列可以包含基础表中的重复值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此列的默认值为 false。The default for this column is false.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`：列是一组的行集中的列，合起来看，唯一标识行。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 使用列集**IsKey**设置为 true 必须唯一地标识行集中的行。The set of columns with **IsKey** set to true must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 没有任何要求这组列是列的最小集。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 这组列可能会生成从基表主键、 唯一约束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index. `false`：列不需要唯一标识行。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|表或视图中包含的列的数据存储区的名称。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基表名称，null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|数据存储区中列的名称。The name of the column in the data store. 这可能是不同于在返回的列名称**ColumnName**列，如果使用别名。This might be different than the column name returned in the **ColumnName** column if an alias was used. 如果无法确定基本列名或列数据中的行集列是派生的但并不完全相同，如果存储一个 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此列的默认值为空值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|包含的列的数据存储区中的架构的名称。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果无法确定基本架构名称，null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此列的默认值为空值。The default for this column is a null value.| 在结果集中的每个列返回一行。A row is returned for every column in the results set. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保元数据列返回正确的信息，必须调用与`behavior`参数设置为`KeyInfo`。To ensure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the `behavior` parameter set to `KeyInfo`. 否则，一些架构表中的列可能返回默认情况下，为 null，或不正确数据。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 null 数据库列，此方法返回 。This method returns for null database columns. 此方法返回的值可能是转换的从 Oracle 的数字数据类型到.NET 十进制类型的结果。The value returned by this method might be the result of the conversion from Oracle's Number data type to .NET Decimal type. 如果值为太大，以.NET Decimal 存储，此方法将引发，它是溢出异常。If the value is too large to be stored in the .NET Decimal, this method throws an that is an overflow exception.
